description: Try our easy to follow Teriyaki Salmon with Egg Noodle Stir Fry  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Teriyaki Salmon with Egg Noodle Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: 1. Combine salmon and teriyaki sauce in a bowl, and toss to coat.

2. Meanwhile, bring a large saucepan of water to the boil. Cook egg noodles for 7 minutes, stirring occasionally to help separate. Add broccoli and capsicum and cook with the noodles for 1 minute. Drain.
3. Whilst noodles are cooking, combine the soy sauce, honey, spring onion and garlic. Set aside.

4. Heat half of the oil in a large frying pan or wok over medium heat. Add salmon to pan and sear, tossing regularly for approximately 4-5 minutes, or until cooked to your liking. Remove from the pan and keep warm.
5. Wipe out the pan, return to the heat with remaining oil. Add broccoli, capsicum, noodles and soy sauce mixture to the pan. Cook whilst tossing for 1-2 minutes.
6. Divide noodles between serving bowls, top with the salmon and a squeeze of lemon.
